short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that shows you a different APT on every new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are so many APTs; Stealth Falcon, Stardust Chollima, APT3, and so many more. Threat Intelligent is a way to start learning about them! Every new tab shows a different threat actor. 

With this extension you can learn about an advanced persistent threat on your screen every time you open a new tab. 

Version 1.0.1 has 104 APTs, but there's many more to come!
